name: VetRec
headline: AI Scribe for veterinarians. Saving time and improving patient care.
description: VetRec automates the process of taking clinical notes for veterinarians in a matter of seconds. Veterinarians should just review clinical notes, not spend time creating them. A visit with a pet is precious and 100% of the focus should be spent on the pet, not on notes. VetRec is the veterinarian's best friend.

founders.name: David de Matheu, Founder
founders.description: David started his career working in gaming, communications and developer experience at Microsoft. He is passionate in building solutions that help democratize technology, especially within the developer community.

founders.name: Kevin Cohen, Founder
founders.description:
Originally from Venezuela, Kevin is a Software Engineer who spent 5+years at Microsoft building Data and AI platforms. Kevin left Microsoft to go work at Circle - the creators of USDC - building a service for ingesting and labeling blockchain data. Now, he is focused on building VetRec, the veterinarian's best friend.

On his free time, you will find him cooking and hosting people over, his passion after programming.

# AI powered clinical notes for veterinarians
Get **SOAP** notesready in seconds after each visit to focus on what matters the most: pets
[Try now for FREE!](https://vetrec.io/<https:/app.vetrec.io/register>)
No credit card required.
Have an account? [Login](https://vetrec.io/<https:/app.vetrec.io/>)
![A dog and cat in a doctors coat](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66c400787830ad2449385922_663132b8ef6282c995faf625_Group138-p-500-ezgif.com-png-to-webp-converter.webp)
Testimonials
## Don't take our word for it!
How It Works
## Record. Process. Generate.
![A dog in a doctors coat with a microphone](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66c400c6a2fb4d7e8e66005c_65d4fe521486d9f7e26115b8_out-1__2_-removebg-preview-ezgif.com-png-to-webp-converter.webp)
### 1. Record the consultation
Start recording **with the click of a button**. Go about the consult normally and don't worry about pets making noise!
![A dog in a doctors coat with a computer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66c400c7cb48e16138649eed_65d54ed1be9cb029c6f96b24_out-0__12_-removebg-preview-ezgif.com-png-to-webp-converter.webp)
### 2. Process session
Once the session is done, let **VetRec process it.** Make sure to use one of our built-in templates or create **your** **own fully-customizable SOAP template**!
![A dog in a doctors coat with a stack of papers](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66c400c6347fe815efa266e6_65d54e50883e686ab20b8f49_out-3__3_-removebg-preview-ezgif.com-png-to-webp-converter.webp)
### 3. Generate notes
After 30 seconds **(yes 30!)** the notes will be ready! Review and**integrate them into your PiMS**.
More than a scribe...
## Help before, during and after consults
![Microphone icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/670ebe6e4047e968ae922b2f_file-solid.svg)
### Patient History Summary
Summarize up to **1500 pages** of patient history including **handwritten notes and lab results**.
![Medical icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/65a2f1c2a4d5d6dbe82a5a56_notes-medical-solid.svg)
### SOAP Notes
VetRec uses **state-of-the-art AI technology** to **automatically generate** detailed and customizable medical notes.
![Chart icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/65c3483b3f93f6505e7d9c9e_clipboard-list-solid.svg)
### Client Documentation
Once everything is said and done, have **patient-ready documentation** generated with all the details discussed during the consult. 
![Medical notes icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/67913c6382c10cbe117307f1_robot-solid.svg)
### D.A.V.I.D AI
Use our built-in **AI assistant** to help with research **tasks** , **questions** or just getting some inspiration with **differentials**!
![Medical notes icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/65c3483a139296e20b295265_copy-solid.svg)
### Custom Templates
**Pick from over 35 provided templates** or **bring your own**. Custom templates help you adapt VetRec to your own style or specialty needs.
![Papertrail icon](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/67913d7d058368ae5b36e466_link-solid.svg)
### PiMS Integration
**Export from notes to your desired PiMs with one click**! VetRec support two-way integrations with select PiMS!
Even more testimonials!
![Doctor Luis Pizarro](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66bd7797779e36cc96008121_65eea3198d0f6e270af9abe0_DrPizarro.png)
### Luis Pizarro
 _DVM, Veterinary Emergency Group_
 _"VetRec is a great app to have. Definitely gives you flexibility and the option to control your time better. As we all know, time is invaluable and I feel a weight lifted off my shoulders with the time spent on remembering each case I've seen."_
![Sergio Mujica](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66bd77972234476ba444bf95_65eea473486f9d1746f89e40_WhatsApp%20Image%202024-02-05%20at%206.48.25%20PM.jpg)
### Sergio Mujica
 _VT, Cooper City Animal Clinic_
 _"VetRec is super accurate. I use with our doctors and it is very simple to use. I do have more time to focus on the pet during the consult rather than on taking notes while talking."_
![Rachel Loesch](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66bd779771cdbd2f2c046800_65eea1e94fd479f1cbbd131d_DrRachel.jpg)
### Rachel Loesch
 _Medical Director, DVM, Fremont Animal Hospital_
 _"We have been using VetRec recently and have been very impressed with quality and how attentive and responsive the founders are. They are always trying to make changes to help the program be more efficient and accurate, and there have been excellent improvements!"_
![Sarah Bartolic](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66bd77f7df9b46464c0b3994_65eea8c668c2a22e231fefb1_Screenshot%202024-03-10%20at%2011.46.25%20PM.png)
### Sarah Bartolic
 _DVM, Veterinary Emergency Group_
 _"I have mainly been using it to take my histories and it has been extremely helpful. Not only does it save me time, but I don't have to worry about remembering everything the owner says and it weeds out the unimportant information. I really appreciate the team being so responsive and fixing issues + adding features before I have time to report them."_
![Matt Connolly](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66bd77f7df9b46464c0b3997_6627057d26725af7b4c229e0_mattconnollypng.png)
### Matthew Connolly
 _DVM, Connolly Animal Clinic_
 _"VetRec has improved my work flow greatly. I no longer have to take notes or go back and remember what all said to the client while I was speaking to them in the exam room. This program filters out all the small talk and only picks up the medically relevant talk. Every time I use it, it seems to get a little better. If, when, I get very busy and do not have the time to do my medical notes right away, the dictation from using VetRec is there. I've really only had to make a few corrections in what was transcribed._**_After using it for a little over two weeks now, I don't see ever going back to not using it._**_"_
![Hadar Friedman](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65a2e1318fc8e618d2a6d5f8/66bd77f7779e36cc9601167e_663325ede99e9618cd94083d_hadarFriedman.jpg)
### Hadar Friedman
 _DVM, Seattle Humane_
 _We just started using VetRec for our community medicine clinic. This tool is very accurate and not only helps remember what happens during all appointments, it also is an_** _incredibly helpful tool for shortening the time spent on records_** _. I anticipate it_** _helping us increase access to care_** _by increasing our time available to spend with pets and their families. In addition, the VetRec team is also very helpful and always eager to help out when needed. Thanks!_

**VetRec is free or heavily discounted for non-profits (depends on size)**. Email us at hello@vetrec.io to learn more.
FAQs
## Frequently Asked Questions
### How do I sign up?
Sign up on [app.vetrec.io](https://vetrec.io/<https:/app.vetrec.io>) and start using it **immediately!** Alternatively, send us an email at hello@vetrec.io and we will be happy to get you started!
### Can I customize VetRec?
Yes! Customize the templates used to generate your notes. Choose what information to include, the style in which is written as well as normal and abnormal values for physical exams.
### I already use dictation software. Do I need VetRec?
VetRec goes beyond just dictation to automate the end-to-end process. Simply start recording the consult and VetRec takes care of the notes. Plus you get a full transcript of the consult for future reference.
### Does VetRec facilitate collaboration?
Yes! VetRec allows you to collaborate in recording and creating your notes with technicians and other vets. Pause and resume recordings as different people participate in consults. VetRec consolidates information gathered across a patient's time with you from history to medical exam and procedure into a single set of notes.
### Do I need special equipment to record?
No! You can use VetRec from any device that has a microphone such as your phone, tablet, laptop, or others.
## Get started today with a free trial.
[Get Started](https://vetrec.io/<https:/app.vetrec.io/register>)

![Hadar Friedman⟨26⟩]
### Hadar Friedman
 _DVM, Seattle Humane_
 _We just started using VetRec for our community medicine clinic. This tool is very accurate and not only helps remember what happens during all appointments, it also is an_** _incredibly helpful tool for shortening the time spent on records_** _. I anticipate it_** _helping us increase access to care_** _by increasing our time available to spend with pets and their families. In addition, the VetRec team is also very helpful and always eager to help out when needed. Thanks!_

FAQs
## Frequently Asked Questions
### How do I sign up?
Sign up on app.vetrec.io⟨34⟩ and start using it **immediately!** Alternatively, send us an email at hello@vetrec.io and we will be happy to get you started!
### Can I customize VetRec?
Yes! Customize the templates used to generate your notes. Choose what information to include, the style in which is written as well as normal and abnormal values for physical exams.
### I already use dictation software. Do I need VetRec?
VetRec goes beyond just dictation to automate the end-to-end process. Simply start recording the consult and VetRec takes care of the notes. Plus you get a full transcript of the consult for future reference.
### Does VetRec facilitate collaboration?
Yes! VetRec allows you to collaborate in recording and creating your notes with technicians and other vets. Pause and resume recordings as different people participate in consults. VetRec consolidates information gathered across a patient's time with you from history to medical exam and procedure into a single set of notes.
### Do I need special equipment to record?
No! You can use VetRec from any device that has a microphone such as your phone, tablet, laptop, or others.

generated_description:
### VetRec: Redefining Veterinary Care with AI

**Overview:**
Founded in 2023 and based in Seattle, WA, VetRec is revolutionizing how veterinarians manage clinical notes. As part of the Y Combinator Batch S23, this innovative startup aims to enhance patient care by saving valuable time—time that should be spent focused on the animals, not on paperwork. 

**Mission:**
At its core, VetRec's mission is to serve as an AI-powered scribe specifically designed for veterinarians. The idea is straightforward: if veterinary consultations are precious, the time spent on note-taking should be slashed. VetRec automates the generation of clinical notes in mere seconds, allowing vets to concentrate on what truly matters—caring for pets.

**How It Works:**
The process is simple:
1. **Record** the consultation with a click of a button.
2. Let VetRec **process** the session, either using built-in templates or customizable SOAP formats.
3. Within **30 seconds**, have the generated notes ready for review and integration into your practice management system (PiMS).

This setup isn't just about taking notes faster; it’s about accuracy and efficiency, minimizing the mental load on veterinarians during and after consultations.

**Team and Support:**
VetRec is powered by a small but mighty team of 8 employees, with guidance from Group Partner Aaron Epstein. The team is known for its responsiveness and commitment to improving the platform based on user feedback, which is vital in a field where every second counts.

**Key Features:**
- **Comprehensive AI Integration:** VetRec not only records conversations but also processes them intelligently, creating a seamless workflow from consultation to documentation.
- **Custom Templates:** Users can choose from over 35 templates or design their own, tailoring the notes to suit varying needs and specialties.
- **Patient History Summarization:** Summarize extensive patient histories—up to 1500 pages—bringing together all necessary information in one concise document.
- **Two-Way PiMS Integration:** Effortlessly export notes to designated PiMS platforms with a single click, enhancing workflow efficiency even further.

**Pricing:**
VetRec adopts a straightforward pricing model:
- **$149/month** for individual veterinarians or clinics per vet, with a two-week free trial.
- Discounts are available for non-profits and relief work, showcasing a commitment to accessibility in veterinary care.

**Feedback and Testimonials:**
Veterinarians using VetRec praise its accuracy and the freedom it offers during consultations. Users report feeling more present with their patients and less encumbered by the administrative burden of record-keeping.

**Get Started:**
For veterinarians looking to simplify their workflow, VetRec offers a free trial sign-up at [vetrec.io](https://vetrec.io). The platform is designed to work across devices, necessitating no special equipment—a simple microphone suffices to start recording.

### Final Thoughts
VetRec isn't just another software tool; it's a transformative approach to veterinary practice, blending technology with compassion. By streamlining the note-taking process, VetRec empowers veterinarians to focus on what truly matters: the health and well-being of the pets they serve.
